name: COD Status
author: Bluscream (bluscream_)
short: Monitors Activision online services status and posts updates to channels
description: Monitors Activision online services status and posts updates to channels
install_msg: Thanks for installing COD Status! This cog monitors Activision's online services status and can post updates to selected channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores channel IDs for status updates and optional bot status configuration.
